item.title: Technology & Weddings: Livestreams, Apps & Social
item.description: From live-streamed ceremonies to custom hashtags, tech now plays a big role in weddings. Here’s how to make it enhance—not distract from—the day.

item.description: Sometimes less really is more. Smaller guest counts can mean bigger impact, deeper connection, and more budget for personal details.

item.title: Planning a Wedding During Peak Season
item.description: Summer and early fall are wedding high season—venues book fast, vendors charge premiums, and travel fills up. Here’s how to plan smart.
